resources.string: Download images from your mobile network.
Photos that failed to transfer will be removed from the list.
All saved data will be deleted.
Set up an app that shares images often.

You can perform integrated search by searching the first screen. If there is already a search result, relevant search images are updated on the screen every time you input. If you want to search for the desired image, just type the word and select the Search button on the input keyboard.

When you enter another keyword in the search results, the results associated with the keyword are filtered in the search results. You can, of course, search the entered query again. You can delete search results with the delete button on the right.
You can check the details by pressing and holding the searched photo.
You can add your favorite images by selecting hearts. The added image is shown on the first screen.
Selecting a link will take you to the image origin page.
You can pin the Quick Search menu on the Notifications panel.
You can delete all stored data.
